Module ua.leirimnad.lab2
Package ua.leirimnad.lab2

Class SetClock

java.lang.Object
ua.leirimnad.lab2.SetClock
Direct Known Subclasses:
Alarm, Timer
public abstract class SetClock extends Object
Abstract class for a clock with widget, group, set, tick and going off function.

      Constructs a SetClock, it's widget, and assigns in to a group

  • Method Details

    • delete

      public void delete()
      Deletes a SetClock, resetting it and deleting from group.

    • setOnDelete

      public void setOnDelete(javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handler)
      Sets a function to be called when clock is deleted
      Parameters:
      handler - function to be called

    • setOnUnset

      public void setOnUnset(javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handler)
      Sets a function to be called when clock is set to "false". Function is also called when clock is deleted.
      Parameters:
      handler - function to be called

    • setOnGoingOff

      public void setOnGoingOff(javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handler)
      Sets a function to be called when clock goes off.
      Parameters:
      handler - function to be called

    • setOnTurnOff

      public void setOnTurnOff(javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handler)
      Sets a function to be called when clock is unset after it went off.
      Parameters:
      handler - function to be called

    • setOnTick

      public void setOnTick(javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handler)
      Sets a function to be called on clock tick. For example, for timer this function is called every second if timer is set.
      Parameters:
      handler - function to be called

    • setOnDrag

      public void setOnDrag(javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.DragEvent> handler)
      Sets a function to be called when clock's widget was dragged.
      Parameters:
      handler - function to be called

    • goOff

      public void goOff()
      Sets clock as went off. Notifies the user. Sets the styles that indicate that clock has gone off. Plays the beeping sound.

    • turnOff

      public void turnOff()
      Function to be called when clock has gone off and the user wants to turn it off.

    • getGroup

      public SetClockGroup getGroup()
      Returns clock's group.
      Returns:
      group instance

    • changeGroup

      public void changeGroup(SetClockGroup to)
      Changes clock's group.
      Parameters:
      to - new group

    • getWidget

      public javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane getWidget()
      Returns a widget of a clock. If clock doesn't have one, creates it.
      Returns:
      clock's widget

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Does the clock tick. For timers, one second is subtracted from the time that's left. For clock's, checks if the set time was reached.

    • setIndicateEffect

      public void setIndicateEffect(int ms)
      Sets an effect on clock's widget that is based on opacity change.
      Parameters:
      ms - effect duration in milliseconds

    • isSet

      public boolean isSet()
      Returns true if the clock is set at the moment, else returns false.
      Returns:
      is clock set

    • set

      public abstract void set(boolean to)
      Sets or unsets a clock.
      Parameters:
      to - true for setting, false for unsetting

    • updateWidget

      protected abstract void updateWidget()
      Updates clock's widget, changes all the labels.

    • createWidget

      protected abstract void createWidget()
      Creates a widget for the clock, based on clock's class.

    • showNotification

      protected abstract void showNotification()
      Shows a notification for a user that clock has gone off.

    • doTick

      protected abstract void doTick()
      Tick function that does all the logic for a tick, based on clock's class.

    • getTotalDuration

      public abstract long getTotalDuration()
      Returns the total amount of time to wait for potential clock's going off, considering that clock is not set at the moment.
      Returns:
      seconds until potential going off

    • getTimeLeft

      public abstract long getTimeLeft()
      Returns the total amount of time to wait for potential clock's going off, based on if clock is set.
      Returns:
      seconds until potential going off
